statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_performance;
SELECT block_number, transaction_count FROM blockchain_performance WHERE miner_address = '0x123456789';
SELECT block_timestamp, miner_address FROM blockchain_performance ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(transaction_count) AS avg_transactions, MAX(transaction_count) AS max_transactions FROM blockchain_performance;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_performance WHERE block_number > 1000 ORDER BY block_number ASC, block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_performance
SELECT miner_address, block_number FROM blockchain_performance WHERE transaction_count > 100
SELECT hash_id, block_timestamp FROM blockchain_performance WHERE miner_address = 'abc123'
SELECT AVG(transaction_count), MAX(block_number) FROM blockchain_performance
SELECT * FROM blockchain_performance ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM blocks
SELECT block_hash, block_size FROM blocks WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blocks ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT block_hash, transactions FROM blocks WHERE block_size > 1000
SELECT block_id, analysis_result, analysis_date FROM analytics
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT block_size, timestamp FROM blocks WHERE transactions > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_hash, block_size, transactions FROM blocks WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT b.id, a.analysis_result FROM blocks b JOIN analytics a ON b.id = a.block_id WHERE a.analysis_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(block_size) FROM blocks GROUP BY transactions HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY AVG(block_size) DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_timestamp ASC;
SELECT block_id, transaction_count FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id >= 1000;
SELECT hash FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND block_timestamp <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE cpu_usage > 50.00 ORDER BY metric_id DESC;
SELECT block_id, memory_usage FROM performance_metrics INNER JOIN analytics_insights ON performance_metrics.block_id = analytics_insights.metric_id WHERE analysis_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id = 1;
SELECT block_id, transaction_count FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT block_timestamp, hash FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_count > 10 ORDER BY block_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE cpu_usage > 50 AND memory_usage < 30 ORDER BY block_id;
SELECT a.insight_id, p.cpu_usage, a.analysis_date FROM performance_metrics p JOIN analytics_insights a ON p.metric_id = a.metric_id WHERE p.cpu_usage > 70;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data;
SELECT miner_address, transaction_count, block_hash FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT receiver_address, sender_address, transaction_amount FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount), MAX(transaction_amount), MIN(transaction_amount) FROM transaction_data;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_id > 100 ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, transaction_count FROM blockchain_data WHERE miner_address = 'abc123' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT block_id, miner_address, timestamp FROM blockchain_data WHERE transaction_count > 1000 AND miner_address LIKE 'miner%' ORDER BY block_id;

SELECT td.transaction_id, td.sender_address, td.receiver_address, td.transaction_amount, pm.processing_time_ms FROM transaction_data td INNER JOIN performance_metrics pm ON td.transaction_id = pm.block_id;

SELECT ai.analysis_id, ai.block_id, ai.avg_transaction_amount, am.miner_address, ai.analysis_timestamp FROM analytics_insights ai JOIN blockchain_data bd ON ai.block_id = bd.block_id WHERE ai.total_transactions_count > 500 ORDER BY ai.analysis_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data;
SELECT block_number, gas_used FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_number DESC;
SELECT miner_id, mining_power, block_reward FROM miner_performance WHERE mining_power >= 1000;
SELECT timestamp, active_nodes FROM network_activity WHERE active_nodes > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE latency_ms < 10;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_number DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT block_number, transactions FROM blockchain_data WHERE gas_used > 1000 ORDER BY block_number ASC;
SELECT miner_id, mining_power, block_reward FROM miner_performance WHERE mining_power >= 50 AND block_reward < 5 ORDER BY miner_id;
SELECT * FROM network_activity WHERE active_nodes > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT timestamp, throughput_Mbps FROM performance_metrics WHERE latency_ms < 10 ORDER BY timestamp;
